channel.title: Why hasn't crisisx
channel.description: Okay okay I know it's a question but. Why hasn't crisisx been shutdown yet? They make over 1000$ per month! Why in the hell are they still up and running?

item.title: Why hasn't crisisx
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:34, topic:360908”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=457200.msg3351790#msg3351790 date=1285408029]

Because it is run by someone smart and not some dumb ass 10 year old who thinks they are great.

he’s far from smart, the reason why his server is still up because it isn’t famous, for example, battlescape is famous, there still up, wanna know why? because jagex can’t do anything, according to copyright laws, if the copywritten material is atleast 20% edited, it’s considered a completely different product, jagex owns all their cache, palidino put them all together, making all 3 into 1, making it not copywritten since it’s atleast 20% edited

You don’t even know what you’re talking about. I love how you just pull numbers out of your ass. I’d like to see where you got your information from.
[/quote]

So your auguring the fact that most servers out are run by dumb ass 10 year olds?, I think almost 90% of the community could agree with me (bullshit numbers are bullshit).[/quote]

He’s arguing the fact that silabgarza is wrong about copyright laws.

Read full topic

[/quote]

You don’t even know what you’re talking about. I love how you just pull numbers out of your ass. I’d like to see where you got your information from.[/quote]

So your auguring the fact that most servers out are run by dumb ass 10 year olds?, I think almost 90% of the community could agree with me (bullshit numbers are bullshit).

Read full topic

They sleep with Mod MMG

by “Mod MMG” do you mean Mod Mark(RS Lead Designer)? cus they are two very different people…

ontopic, CrisisX is just very lucky… I was a staff member there and they recieved multiple warnings, about the “BlackMarket” section.

item.title: Why hasn't crisisx
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

InnovationX had over 1200 players and was making $5k the second month it was up. And now it’s almost the 4th and the population declined heavily because I quit. So no more updates.

Because it is run by someone smart and not some dumb ass 10 year old who thinks they are great.

he’s far from smart, the reason why his server is still up because it isn’t famous, for example, battlescape is famous, there still up, wanna know why? because jagex can’t do anything, according to copyright laws, if the copywritten material is atleast 20% edited, it’s considered a completely different product, jagex owns all their cache, palidino put them all together, making all 3 into 1, making it not copywritten since it’s atleast 20% edited[/quote]

Can you link to that ‘copyright law’? Because I’d be willing to bet it doesn’t exist.

Read full topic
